Isn't Enlightenment just a window manager, not a desktop enviroment?

You need to set the public permission to those directories, 777 would give full read, write and execute access to everyone, 775 would give read, write and execute to the owner and group and read, execute to public (everyone). You can set 775 if you don't want everyone to access it and add the users you want to be able to access it to the group the owner is in.
